org.springframework.data.mapping

接口 IdentifierAccessor

  • 所有已知实现类:
    IdPropertyIdentifierAccessor, TargetAwareIdentifierAccessor

    public interface IdentifierAccessor
    Interface for a component allowing the access of identifier values.
    另请参阅:
    TargetAwareIdentifierAccessor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object getIdentifier()
      Returns the value of the identifier.
      default Object getRequiredIdentifier()
      Returns the identifier of the underlying instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getIdentifier

        @Nullable
Object getIdentifier()
        Returns the value of the identifier.
        返回:
        the identifier of the underlying instance.

      • getRequiredIdentifier

        default Object getRequiredIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier of the underlying instance. Implementations are strongly recommended to extends either TargetAwareIdentifierAccessor or override this method to add more context to the exception being thrown in case of the absence of an identifier.
        返回:
        the identifier of the underlying instance
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - in case no identifier could be retrieved.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
